name: Timely Apart
description:
A father, devastated by the loss of his son. Five years in the past, an incipient terrible catastrophe that overcame the entire planet took him. Now, he has to make do, but he returns to the place where it happened every single day. Until one day, the weakened fabric of reality allowed a fissure in time to happen, giving him renewed hope.

Credits:

Pixel art, sound curator and level design: https://www.twitter.com/hebilee

Programming, modeling and level design: MarioBG
